## flip

A simple flip transition.

**Properties**

-   `x` **[Array][1]** Flips on the x axis
-   `y` **[Array][1]** Flips on the y axis

[1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array
